title: 284: Is He (Just Not) That Into You? w/ Bekah’s Best 1st Date aka Erik Bragg
itunes:title: 284: Is He (Just Not) That Into You? w/ Bekah’s Best 1st Date aka Erik Bragg
description:
So much tea, so much fun! The Broads are joined by Bekah’s best first date, Erik Bragg!

They discuss her reading his texts on the podcast, his side of their story, his tips for crafting the best first date, and then they answer the #broadsquad’s “Is he just not that into me?” questions! 

ERIK BRAGG:

Follow him on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thisguysthelimit/

CHATTY BROADS MERCH:Purchase this CB merch before it sells out! Click here: https://chattybroads.store/

GET TICKETS TO THE LIVE ONLINE SHOW HERE: https://app.loopedlive.com/c/3679

 

VOTE FOR US FOR PEOPLE’S CHOICE PODCAST AWARDS!

Vote here for “Best Comedy Podcast” + “Best Female Hosted Podcast”: https://www.podcastawards.com/

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***STAMPS.COM: Use code CHATTY and get a 4-week trial PLUS free postage and a digital scale at STAMPS.COM

***DIPSEA: Get a 30 day free trial when you go to Dipseastories.com/CHATTYLee Kawasaki
